enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: FLL is disabled in STOP4 mode

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FLL is enbled in STOP4 mode

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Filter of Reset pad is disabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Filter of Reset pad is enabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b00
enumeratedValue.description: All off-chip accesses (instruction and data) via the Flexbus are disallowed

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: All off-chip accesses (instruction and data) via the Flexbus are disallowed

enumeratedValue.name: 0b10
enumeratedValue.description: Off-chip instruction accesses are disallowed. Data accesses are allowed

enumeratedValue.name: 0b11
enumeratedValue.description: Off-chip instruction accesses and data accesses are allowed

field.name: RAMSIZE
field.description: The RAM size in the device

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: RAM size is 16 KB in the device. ( 8 KB Upper SRAM. 8 KB Lower SRAM)

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: RAM size is 24 KB in the device. (16 KB Upper SRAM. 8 KB Lower SRAM)

field.name: FSIZE
field.description: The flash size of the device

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: TSI is not available in the device

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: TSI is available in the device

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Maximum clock in the system is 36 MHz

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Maximum clock in the system is 72 MHz

field.name: FTM1CH0SRC
field.description: FTM1 channel 0 input capture source select

field.name: FTM2CH0SRC
field.description: FTM2 channel 0 input capture source select

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: UART0_TX pin modulated by FTM1 CH0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b10
enumeratedValue.description: UART0_TX pin modulated by FTM2 CH0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: UART1_TX pin modulated by FTM1 CH0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b10
enumeratedValue.description: UART1_TX pin modulated by FTM2 CH0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Alternate Trigger Selected for ADC2 as defined by ADC2TRGSEL

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Alternate Trigger Selected for ADC3 as defined by ADC3TRGSEL

enumeratedValue.name: 0b00
enumeratedValue.description: ICSOUT divided by 4, it is valid only when Maxclk = 36 MHz

enumeratedValue.name: 0b11
enumeratedValue.description: ICSOUT divided by 16, it is valid only when Maxclk = 36 MHz
